SELECT fctl_pk, fctl_padre_pk, fctl_fctr_pk, fctl_fcts_pk, fctl_rgla_pk, fctl_impuesto_prmt_pk, fctl_ssrv_pk , fctl_fini, fctl_ffin , fctl_cuant1, fctl_cuant2, fctl_cuant3, fctl_cuant4, fctl_cuant5, fctl_cuant6 , fctl_info1, fctl_info2, fctl_info3, fctl_info4, fctl_info5, fctl_info6
, rgla_codigo
, prmt_parametro AS fctl_impuesto_prmt , prmt_tppr_pk AS fctl_impuesto_tppr_pk
, ssrv_numero, ssrv_tpss_pk
, srvc_pk, srvc_subp_pk, srvc_anno, srvc_numero, srvc_tpsr_pk
, (SELECT prmt_parametro FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_pk = srvc_subp_pk) AS srvc_subp
, (SELECT SUM(fctd_importe_base) FROM tbl_factura_det_fctd WHERE fctd_fctl_pk = fctl_pk) AS fctl_importe_base , (SELECT SUM(fctd_importe) FROM tbl_factura_det_fctd WHERE fctd_fctl_pk = fctl_pk) AS fctl_importe , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_factura_det_fctd WHERE fctd_fctl_pk = fctl_pk) AS fctl_fctd_count FROM tbl_factura_lin_fctl INNER JOIN tbl_regla_rgla ON rgla_pk = fctl_rgla_pk INNER JOIN tbl_parametro_prmt ON prmt_pk = fctl_impuesto_prmt_pk INNER JOIN tbl_servicio_srvc ON EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_factura_srv_fcts WHERE fcts_pk = fctl_fcts_pk AND fcts_srvc_pk = srvc_pk ) LEFT JOIN tbl_subservicio_ssrv ON ssrv_pk = fctl_ssrv_pk
